results.title: ECG of the month. Irregular rhythm in a 25-year-old man with three prior cardiac operations. Coarse atrial fibrillation with a rapid ventricular response, left anterior fascicular block, left ventricular hypertrophy with repolarization abnormality.
results.text_hl: The @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ underwent closure of an @<m>DISEASE_Heart_Septal_Defects_Atrial</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006344 @@@atrial septal defect@@@ at age 3, had a leaking "mitral" valve repaired at age 9, and at age 13 had a "mitral" valve replacement.

citations.NLM: Glancy DL, Ahmed J, Ayalloore SG, LeLorier PA, Diwan PM, Helmcke FR. ECG of the month. Irregular rhythm in a 25-year-old man with three prior cardiac operations. Coarse atrial fibrillation with a rapid ventricular response, left anterior fascicular block, left ventricular hypertrophy with repolarization abnormality. J La State Med Soc. 2013 Jan-Feb;165(1):40-1. PMID: 23550397
